name: Flower Protector (pisti72)
description:
Protect your flower with your robot by spaying the evil pests.

This is a demake of PSSST! which was the first game what I played on my first home computer ZX Spectrum.

The original game was developed by Ultimate Play the Game company in 1983.

Controls:

  • with keyboard movement by arrows and fire by Z or X
  • or with game controller
